snippet: As it prepared to meet with the deputy director of the United Nations nuclear watchdog, Iran said on Wednesday that it had begun to install more sophisticated enrichment devices.
abstract: Fereydoon Abbasi, head of Iran's Atomic Energy Agency, is quoted as saying that his country has begun to install more sophisticated enrichment devices at its Natanz nuclear site; development coincides with start of new round of talks with negotiators from United Nations nuclear watchdog.
lead_paragraph: As it prepared to meet with the deputy director of the United Nations nuclear watchdog, Iran said on Wednesday that it had begun to install more sophisticated enrichment devices.

headline.seo: Iran Upgrades Nuclear Plant as Talks Resume
headline.main: Iran Upgrades Devices at Nuclear Plant as Talks Resume
headline.print_headline: Iran Upgrades Devices at Nuclear Plant as Talks Resume
